titleStmt.title: Three sermons tvvo of them appointed for the Spittle, preached in St. Pauls Church, by John Squier, vicar of St. Leonards Shoredich in Middlesex: and John Lynch, parson of Herietsham in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Squire, John, ca. 1588-1653.
Lynch, John, 1590 or 91-1680. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Young for Humfrey Blunden, neere the Castle Taverne in Corne-hill,

notesStmt.note: "Pascha Christianum .. By John Lynch" and "A sermon, preached in S. Pauls Church in London, by John Squier priest" each have separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
